XOrder.CreateAnonymousOrderEnabled.title: Allow anonymous users to create orders (XAPI)

XPurchase.IsSelectedForCheckout.title: Default "Selected for checkout" state (XAPI)
XPurchase.IsSelectedForCheckout.description: For new line items and gifts. This setting is store level.

Frontend.PageTitleWithStoreName.title: Show store name in page title
Frontend.PageTitleWithStoreName.description: Show store name in page title. Example: 'Home - StoreName'.

Frontend.PageTitleStoreNameAlign.title: Store name position in page title
Frontend.PageTitleStoreNameAlign.description: Store name position in page title. Supported values: start, end.

Frontend.CatalogMenuLinkListName.title: Top level catalog linked list
Frontend.CatalogMenuLinkListName.description: Specifies the name of the top-level catalog linked list (e.g., catalog-menu). If left empty, the menu will be automatically generated based on existing categories.

Frontend.CatalogEmptyCategoriesEnabled.title: Display empty categories
Frontend.CatalogEmptyCategoriesEnabled.description: It controls the request for retrieving categories without products

Frontend.SupportPhoneNumber.title: Support phone number
Frontend.SupportPhoneNumber.description: The phone number in the 'Call us' section
